mapper.sql: /*[BaseTbbsModlInf.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT MODL_SEQ , MODL_NM , MODL_TP , TMP_SEQ , US_YN , CTEGRY_MST_CD , SYS_CD , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM TBBS_MODL_INF WHERE MODL_SEQ = #{modl_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: /*[TbbsModlInf.xml][selectTbbsModlInfInfo][모듈그리드 출력][TANINE]*/ SELECT MODL_SEQ , MODL_NM , MODL_TP , TMP_SEQ FROM TBBS_MODL_INF WHERE US_YN = 'Y' AND TMP_SEQ = #{tmp_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} UNION ALL SELECT MODL_SEQ , MODL_NM , MODL_TP , TMP_SEQ FROM TBBS_MODL_INF WHERE US_YN = 'Y' AND TMP_SEQ = (SELECT TMPL_SEQ FROM TDSP_TMPL_INF WHERE UP_TMPL_SEQ = #{tmp_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DSPLY_NO = 1)

/*[TbbsModlInf.xml][selectTbbsModlInfIntraList][인트라넷 게시판 목록 조회(BO)][TANINE]*/ SELECT M.MODL_SEQ , M.MODL_NM , M.MODL_TP , M.TMP_SEQ FROM TBBS_MODL_INF M LEFT OUTER JOIN TCMN_CD_DTL CD ON (M.TMP_SEQ = CD.CD) WHERE CD.MST_CD = 'INTRA' ORDER BY M.MODL_NM

/*[TbbsModlInf.xml][selectTbbsModlInfErikList][ERIK용 모듈 조회][TANINE]*/ SELECT M.TMP_SEQ , M.MODL_NM , M.MODL_SEQ FROM TBBS_MODL_INF M WHERE M.MODL_SEQ IN
#{list.module_srl}

/* [TbbsModlInf.xml][selectTbbsModlInfMovieList][동영상 게시판 목록 조회(BO)][TANINE] */ SELECT A.MODL_SEQ , A.MODL_NM , A.MODL_TP , A.TMP_SEQ FROM TBBS_MODL_INF A WHERE A.MODL_TP IN ('B_TYPE5') AND A.TMP_SEQ NOT IN (SELECT Z.CD FROM TCMN_CD_DTL Z WHERE Z.MST_CD = 'INTRA') AND A.TMP_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND A.US_YN = 'Y'
